item.title: Michele add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Turn your wounds into wisdom." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Michele add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "you have to love something before you can hate it." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Michele add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Michele add a quote by BILL WATTERSON
item.description: "It's not denial. I'm just selective about the reality I accept." -- BILL WATTERSON

item.title: Michele add a quote by Taylor Swift
item.description: "When I was a little girl I used to read fairy tales. In fairy tales you meet Prince Charming and he's everything you ever wanted. In fairy tales the bad guy is very easy to spot. The bad guy is always wearing a black cape so you always know who he is. Then you grow up and you realize that Prince Charming is not as easy to find as you thought. You realize the bad guy is not wearing a black cape and he's not easy to spot; he's really funny, and he makes you laugh, and he has perfect hair." -- Taylor Swift

item.title: Michele add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Michele add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Don't say you don't have enough time. You have exactly the same number of hours per day that were given to Helen Keller, Pasteur, Michaelangelo, Mother Teresa, Leonardo da Vinci, Thomas Jefferson, and Albert Einstein." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Michele add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "In ancient times cats were worshipped as gods; they have not forgotten this." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Michele add a quote by Natalie Babbitt
item.description: "Don't be afraid of death; be afraid of an unlived life. You don't have to live forever, you just have to live." -- Natalie Babbitt

item.title: Michele add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is my belief... that the truth is generally preferable to lies." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Michele add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "Animals are my friends...and I don't eat my friends." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Michele add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Death must be so beautiful. To lie in the soft brown earth, with the grasses waving above one's head, and listen to silence. To have no yesterday, and no tomorrow. To forget time, to forgive life, to be at peace." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Michele add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "People think it must be fun to be a super genius, but they don't realize how hard it is to put up with all the idiots in the world." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Michele add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Michele add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Hate the sin, love the sinner." -- Mahatma Gandhi
